entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @realDonaldTrump Do you think right now people are concerned about buying a new car, hell no. You need to learn  Where your  Priorities lay. You should be worried about getting the coronavirus under control.  Stop worrying about shit the don't matter. Healthcare, economy matter.
